solution: 1. Immediate Inspection: Conduct a thorough inspection of all landing gear components, focusing on the surface finish of bearing casings to identify any non-compliant parts. 2. Design Review: Collaborate with the OEM to review the design specifications of bearing casings and make necessary amendments to enhance durability and compliance. 3. Monitor Maintenance Practices: Implement a rigorous maintenance schedule that includes regular checks on lubrication levels and bearing conditions to prevent failures related to excessive wear or improper lubrication.
